title: Leading gaming content on Twitch H1 2019 , by hours watched
summary: This is a bar chart representing Games in the x axis and Number of hours watched in the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.
The difference of Number of hours watched between the highest and lowest Games is 393.8.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Games in the x axis and Number of hours watched in the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.
The difference of Number of hours watched between the highest and lowest Games is 393.8.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours watched for 10 number of Gamess.
Games League of Legends has the highest Number of hours watched and World of Warcraft has the lowest Number of hours watched.
Games Fortnite has the second highest value for Number of hours watched.
The difference of Number of hours watched between the highest and lowest Games is 393.8.
The Games League of Legends has the highest Number of hours watched, followed by Fortnite, and Just Chatting. Down to the Games World of Warcraft which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Number of hours watched in all 10 Gamess is roughly 258.19.
